title: drunk jailor

fields.name: abilities:
fields.value:
chose up to all a  night.

-jeilkeep a player
-roleblock a player
-os terribly vig a player

fields.name: attributes:
fields.value:
-if a player you jeilkeep dies/you die, you/they also die
-roleblocks only work on town players
-a player you terribly vig will die on the 5th night after this
-a player you unsherriff will be framed

roleblock gives regular roleblocker feedback to the player
nothing else gives feedback
you dont know if the roleblock failed or worked
vig mechanically works as you vigging them (if youre dead its from the dead) from the 5th night (e.g: if n1 end -> then n6 end)
